SEARCH
Package com.myhrcrmproject.service

Class UserDetailsServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.myhrcrmproject.service.UserDetailsServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommonService<UserDetailsRequestDTO,UserDetailsResponseDTO>, org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
@Service public class UserDetailsServiceImpl extends Object implements CommonService<UserDetailsRequestDTO,UserDetailsResponseDTO>, org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
Service class that handles CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for user details entities.

This service provides methods to perform operations on user details entities, such as retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting user details records. It also includes additional methods for setting user roles and implementing Spring Security's UserDetailsService.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Denys Chaykovskyy
